00019         struct ModuleHandle::ModuleHandleImpl
00020         {
00021                 ModuleHandleImpl()
00022                         : m_module(0)
00023                         , m_initFunc(0)
00024                         , m_shutdownFunc(0)
00025                         , m_getModuleMap(0)
00026                         , m_refCount(0)
00027                 { }
00028 
00029                 ModuleHandleImpl(ModuleHandle::GET_MAP_FUNC getFunc)
00030                         : m_module(0)
00031                         , m_initFunc(0)
00032                         , m_shutdownFunc(0)
00033                         , m_getModuleMap(getFunc)
00034                         , m_refCount(0)
00035                 {
00036                 }
00037 
00038                 void*                                           m_module;
00039                 ModuleHandle::INIT_FUNC         m_initFunc;
00040                 ModuleHandle::SHUTDOWN_FUNC     m_shutdownFunc;
00041                 ModuleHandle::GET_MAP_FUNC      m_getModuleMap;
00042                 size_t                                          m_refCount;
00043         };

00065         ModuleHandle::ModuleHandle(GET_MAP_FUNC mapFunc)
00066                 : m_impl(new ModuleHandleImpl(mapFunc))

00073         ModuleHandle::ModuleHandle(const ModuleHandle& other)
00074                 : m_impl(other.m_impl)
00075         {
00076                 if(m_impl)
00077                         ++m_impl->m_refCount;
00078         }

00083         {

00089         ModuleHandle& ModuleHandle::operator =(const ModuleHandle &rhs)
00090         {
00091                 if(this == &rhs)
00092                         return *this;
00093 
00094                 Release();
00095                 if(rhs.m_impl)
00096                 {
00097                         m_impl = rhs.m_impl;
00098                         ++m_impl->m_refCount;
00099                 }
00100                 return *this;
00101         }

00105         bool ModuleHandle::IsLoaded() const
00106         {
00107                 return m_impl != 0;
00108         }

00112         ModuleHandle::iterator ModuleHandle::MapBegin() const
00113         {
00114                 return iterator(m_impl->m_getModuleMap());
00115         }
00116 
00118 
00119         ModuleHandle::iterator ModuleHandle::MapEnd() const
00120         {
00121                 return iterator(0);
00122         }

00126         HResult ModuleHandle::CreateInstance(SF_RIID clsid, SF_RIID riid, void** outObj) const
00127         {
00128                 if(!IsLoaded()) 
00129                         return SF_E_FAIL;
00130 
00131                 HResult hr = SF_E_POINTER;
00132                 if(outObj == 0) 
00133                         return hr;
00134 
00135                 detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* ent = m_impl->m_getModuleMap();
00136                 while(ent->pClsid)
00137                 {
00138                         if(clsid == *ent->pClsid)
00139                         {
00140                                 if(!ent->pClassFactory)
00141                                 {
00142                                         hr = ent->pCreateFactoryFn(UUID_PPV(IClassFactory, &ent->pClassFactory));
00143                                         if(SF_FAILED(hr))
00144                                                 return hr;
00145                                 }
00146                                 hr = ent->pClassFactory->CreateInstance(riid, outObj);
00147                                 return hr;
00148                         }
00149                         ++ent;
00150                 }
00151                 return SF_E_FAIL;
00152         }
00153 
00155 
00156         HResult ModuleHandle::CreateInstance(SF_RIID riid, void** outObj) const
00157         {
00158                 if(!IsLoaded()) 
00159                         return SF_E_FAIL;
00160 
00161                 HResult hr = SF_E_POINTER;
00162                 if(outObj == 0) 
00163                         return hr;
00164 
00165                 detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* ent = m_impl->m_getModuleMap();
00166                 while(ent->pClsid)
00167                 {
00168                         if(ent->pInterfaceId && riid == *ent->pInterfaceId)
00169                         {
00170                                 if(!ent->pClassFactory)
00171                                 {
00172                                         hr = ent->pCreateFactoryFn(UUID_PPV(IClassFactory, &ent->pClassFactory));
00173                                         if(SF_FAILED(hr))
00174                                                 return hr;
00175                                 }
00176                                 hr = ent->pClassFactory->CreateInstance(riid, outObj);
00177                                 return hr;
00178                         }
00179                         ++ent;
00180                 }
00181                 return SF_E_FAIL;
00182         }
00183 
00185 
00186         reflection::user_type* ModuleHandle::GetType(const guid &clsid) const
00187         {
00188                 if(!IsLoaded()) 
00189                         return 0;
00190 
00191                 detail::MODULE_MAP_ENTRY* ent = m_impl->m_getModuleMap();
00192                 while(ent->pClsid)
00193                 {
00194                         if(clsid == *ent->pClsid && ent->pTypeOf)
00195                         {
00196                                 return ent->pTypeOf();
00197                         }
00198                         ++ent;
00199                 }
00200                 return 0;
00201         }

00205         HResult ModuleHandle::Init(const char* moduleName)
00206         {
00207                 Release();
00208 
00210                 void* mod = Sekai_LoadLibrary(moduleName);
00211                 if(!mod)
00212                         return SF_E_FAIL;
00213 
00214                 GET_MAP_FUNC gmf = (GET_MAP_FUNC)Sekai_GetProcAddress(mod, "GetModuleMap");
00215                 if(!gmf)
00216                 {
00217                         Sekai_FreeLibrary(mod);
00218                         return SF_E_FAIL;
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 INIT_FUNC inf = static_cast<INIT_FUNC>(Sekai_GetProcAddress(mod, "ModuleInit"));
00222                 SHUTDOWN_FUNC snf = static_cast<SHUTDOWN_FUNC>(Sekai_GetProcAddress(mod, "ModuleShutdown"));
00223 
00224                 if(inf)
00225                         inf();
00226 
00227                 m_impl = new ModuleHandleImpl();
00228                 m_impl->m_module = mod;
00229                 m_impl->m_getModuleMap = gmf;
00230                 m_impl->m_initFunc = inf;
00231                 m_impl->m_shutdownFunc = snf;
00232                 ++m_impl->m_refCount;
00233 
00234                 return SF_S_OK;
00235         }
00236 
00238 
00239         void ModuleHandle::Shutdown()
00240         {
00241                 if(!m_impl)
00242                         return;
00243 
00244                 // Shutting down module is legal when only one handle left
00245                 ASSERT_SOFT(m_impl->m_refCount <= 1);
00246 
00247                 m_impl->m_initFunc = 0;
00248                 if(m_impl->m_shutdownFunc)
00249                 {
00250                         m_impl->m_shutdownFunc();
00251                         m_impl->m_shutdownFunc = 0;
00252                 }
00253         }
00254 
00256 
00257         void ModuleHandle::Release()
00258         {
00259                 if(!m_impl)
00260                         return;
00261 
00262                 if(!(--m_impl->m_refCount))
00263                 {
00264                         Shutdown();
00265                         if(m_impl->m_module)
00266                                 Sekai_FreeLibrary(m_impl->m_module);
00267                         delete m_impl;
00268                 }
00269 
00270                 m_impl = 0;
00271         }
